name: Lost Abroad Café (Alpha)
description:
Ever wanted to work abroad? Open a business? Work in a coffee shop? Learn a new language? Lost Abroad Café combines all of these into one fun language learning game.

Lost Abroad Café is a management sim game where players open a coffee shop in another country, and must learn the language in order to purchase equipment, serve their customers, and grow their business.

Lost Abroad Café is currently in alpha on iOS TestFlight, Google Play Open Testing, and here on itch.io ! We have content/feature updates every 2-4 weeks, with bug fix patches in between.

Currently available languages:

  • Mandarin Chinese
  • Korean
  • Spanish (Mexico)

Upcoming languages (End of Year 2022):

  • French (France)
  • Japanese
  • Italian
  • German
  • Hindi
  • Portuguese

Learn more at https://www.lostabroadgame.com
